name: Aging Skin Facial Treatment Essence with Antioxidants
about: What it is:A powerful essence that addresses multiple visible skin concerns, providing hydration, radiance, and benefits that target visible signs of aging in a single step..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- PITERA‚Ñ¢: SK-II's signature ingredient that supports skin's natural regeneration..Ingredient Callouts:Free of formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:A comprehensive aging skin solution for visible wrinkles, discoloration, and sun-induced dark spots. Its unique 90 percent PITERA‚Ñ¢ formulation acts as a retinol and vitamin c alternative, simplifying your routine. It is suitable for both dry and oily skin types and can be used day and night..Clinical Results:In a consumer agreement study of 48 women, after 1 use:
ingredients: -PITERA‚Ñ¢: SK-II's signature ingredient that supports skin's natural regeneration...Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate (PITERA‚Ñ¢), Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Water, Sodium Benzoate, Methylparaben, Sorbic Acid.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing and toning, pour a few drops of the essence into your palms..-Gently pat the essence onto your face and neck, ensuring even coverage..-Follow with your favorite serum and moisturizer..-Use day and night for best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a big fan of their Brightening mask (possibly the best sheet mask I've ever used for an instant glow/radiance) and first received a small sample of this as a GWP a few years back. Knowing how fussy my skin can be and therefore not to complicate things, I decided to use this only after I'd gone through my pack of masks and wasn't using anything else, other than the products which were already a part of my daily routine. That was the first time I used it. I also decided to give it another try last year, again not using more than 5-10 drops pressed into my face, before my moisturizer. Both times I started to develop cystic acne and had to discontinue use within just 3-4 days. I always prefer my skincare to be fragrance-free, but this is one exception where I would have welcomed a bit of fragrance. It smells faintly of moldy cheese, which thank heavens does not linger. I did notice a 'renewed' and 'glowy' look to my skin for the short time I used it, and this was probably due to the Pitera. And as much as I believe in this ingredient (my own research aside, just look at some of the other reviews on here!) and its benefits, it's such a shame that something about it, or perhaps one of the other ingredients in it clearly does not agree with my skin. As much as I sometimes feel tempted to give it another shot, I can safely say there won't be a 3rd attempt...  ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: ‚ÄòDivine Herbal‚Äô - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: ‚ÄòPeter Thomas Roth‚Äô ‚Äì Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: ‚ÄòDivine Herbal‚Äô - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: ‚ÄòSisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: ‚ÄòNuxe‚Äô ‚Äì Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: ‚ÄòSephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a good essence to use ever since my fav Korean skincare company stopped shipping to the US, and I was always reluctant to buy this given its price point. So you can imagine my dismay when I finally made the plunge and found out that, sadly‚Äîit actually works really well. Better than the one I used to use in fact.   I will say that given its thinness, the mini size has been lasting me way longer than I anticipated. I tried parsing it out by using my Dr Jart essence every other day, but the way my skin looks and feels is so noticeably better when I use the SKII that I always end up going back to it. I'm thinking that maybe I can make the plunge to the full size and at least be reassured that I won't have to restock it very often.   I have super dry, thick skin, so an essence like this is essential for me. That being said, if you don't already need/use an essence, it probably won't be life changing. If you DO need an essence and have been thinking about trying this one, just know that it does everything it promises‚Äîfor a price.

It's still hard to wrap my head around splurging on the full size, but I'm super impressed.

I think everyone who think this is just expensive water didn‚Äôt really do the research of what galactomyces ferment filtrate is‚Ä¶ this is the main ingredient in their ‚Äúpitera‚Äù trademark and is the first ingredient in their list, they have about 90% of galactomyces ferment filtrate in this product, hence the unpleasant smell, and since this product isn‚Äôt over complicated so hence it feel like water. This is for people with visible sign of aging, and with this and combining healthy lifestyle and diet, one can achieve youthful skin‚Ä¶ yes, you can‚Äôt just expect any product to do all the work for you, if you don‚Äôt care for your physical or mental health, any product would be stretched to the limit to make up for your own lack of care for ur own skin, and you won‚Äôt notice huge difference, but also we as humans have our unavoidable stresses from all aspect of life, and that‚Äôs where this product can help you ease those unavoidable skin stressors. With that said, this product is also a slow learner; meaning this product will work slowly over time, so slow that people don‚Äôt notice difference in years until they one day realize they don‚Äôt look as old as they should be, and that‚Äôs where the magic is. Consistency, is the key in using anything if you believe it works for you. reviews.review_text: I have a simple skincare routine: Dermalogica microfoliant, Skinfix barrier+ lotion, sunscreen. I also very rarely use face makeup (concealers, foundations, or bb creams). This essence became an added step because I was finding very fine lines across my forehead, even though I'm only 23 (Likely sun damage). Previously, I couldn't find a moisturiser that would was hydrating enough to get rid of the fine lines without making me look greasy.   I've been using the essence for 3 weeks now, 2-3 times a day. I splash a few drops on my hands and pat them into my face. Don't use cotton pads as it would waste so much of the product. I kept the rest of my routine the same, but found that my skin retained moisture better, like it made my moisturiser work better than it had been on its own. Because of its watery texture, I highly recommend this for oily skin (it seriously is like patting water into your skin), and it has never added any weight to my routine.   It's expensive, but I've been using the mini size and it's only 3-4 milimeters down from the top of the bottle, so this is going to last a while. What drew me in was also that the active ingredient is the first on the ingredients list, which I have never found on anything else (at least when I was shopping around for essences). But a warning: it has a weird smell, subtle but weird and almost unpleasant, which is likely the natural scent of the ferment filtrate.   TLDR: Worth the hype, will last a long while, will buy again. Took off a star for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SK-II, let‚Äôs talk about it. So I just got the trial size, and so far I have noticed a big difference in skin texture and the fungal acne (or little bumps that wouldn‚Äôt every go away on forehead). I think the brightening was due to a vitamin C serum (from Sephora) I started. I have combo to dry skin, which I just figured out. Honestly makes a huge difference now that I‚Äôm moisturizing way more. So anyway, that‚Äôs what I‚Äôve noticed over a few days, but that could change. It is a very watery formula, but the product comes out in droplets so you typically aren‚Äôt wasting. I just drop a few droplets on my hand, spread out on hand, and then dab into my skin. To me, it doesn‚Äôt smell and isn‚Äôt sticky or anything. Again, to me, it feels like nothing on my face. I use it pm and am, and I‚Äôve barely made a dent in the trial size. Is it worth 235? Not unless you makin big bank. But I‚Äôve had no adverse effects, and I really think it‚Äôs made a difference. I have zero complaints and if I wAs a RiCh gUrL, I would definitely buy. Therefore, a couple of drops on your face once or twice a day...not going to do anything for you. BTW - this is mostly water. Save your $$ & try something different, don't pay for fancy water.

reviews.review_title: wow. my skin has never looked better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: TL DR - yes this delivers unique skin benefits, that so-called ‚Äòdupes‚Äô don‚Äôt, but you don‚Äôt NEED to go into debt for it   Ok. I‚Äôve been curious about this essence forever. But, like a sane person, I thought it was too expensive to even try. I did experiment with essences, though, from affordable k beauty brands to other essences that only seemed affordable when compared to this. Without naming names, I used a very well-known essence that everyone calls an sk-ii dupe, but after going through that bottle I didn‚Äôt notice any results.   Fast forward to the semi annual sale at Sephora, and I decided, sure why not. I‚Äôm 37, have barely spent anything on makeup in two years of lockdown, let‚Äôs splurge.   It was after using this for about 2 weeks when I saw a photo of me and was like .. that‚Äôs me? That‚Äôs what my skin looks like?? It‚Äôs hard to describe exactly, but basically my skin has a dewy, almost ‚Äòwet‚Äô look, all glowy and shiny. Like my face is covered in gloss. But it doesn‚Äôt *feel* goopy or sticky, it‚Äôs completely smooth and soft. I have already bought a second, much larger bottle.   The thing I want to end with is that, while this has worked great for me, I‚Äôm using this as the capstone to a skincare routine that covers all the well-aging essentials ( you know, from regular exfoliation to active-packed serums ). Before spending $200 on this, most people would be better served by incorporating clinically-proven active ingredients and figuring out what cleansers and moisturizers work best with their skin. But if you think you have a pretty complete skincare line up and are still looking for that level-up wow, this might be perfect for you.

Do not use a cotton pad or anything that will soak it up, it feels like water - Let it absorb before applying your moisturizer  I seriously downgraded my skincare - no more serums, daily treatments, masks, etc. because of this product. I also found the lack of scent to be nice, because I am also very sensitive to fragrances. It also was not sticky, and sunk into my skin quickly.   Despite these positives, I could not justify spending so much money on a product that did not seem to deliver results.   Another thing I‚Äôd like to mention is the packaging. I am always seeking out products that use less plastic and more environmentally friendly packaging. I would love to see more brands such as this one, make the switch to more environmentally friendly packaging. Additionally, SK-II is not cruelty free. They test their products on animals. I prefer cruelty free products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to review this actually. I dove into the world of essences last year and never turned back. I‚Äôve bought this Pitera Essence a couple other times. Recently, I got a dupe for SK-II in a k-beauty subscription box. I noticed something immediately, the hole is half the size as the SK-II bottles, and also a quarter of the price. I took a picture of the large size of both essences and the trial size we received. I think the giant hole to dispense product is irresponsible. We go through it 10x as fast, which makes up buy it more. Why wouldn‚Äôt they make the hole small like the cheaper dupe? It really frustrates me that they know we will be layering the product, and that we don‚Äôt need a whole puddle in our hands. Compared to so many other Asian skincare brands and toners and essences, this is the most popular, most effective, most expensive and easiest to waste. ...I would have given this a million stars, and honestly should be knocking off more than just one. The dispensing of th product really bugs me. I put it in a spray bottle now, but I should have to when I pay $200 for one bottle.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it, but not my cup of tea
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to receive this item complimentary to try since I‚Äôd heard for many years the good quality of this brand in skincare. I always have reservations trying out new skincare because I have dry-ish, very sensitive skin. All my life I‚Äôve had severe allergies and eczema - the allergies often causing the eczema to be worse. The area around my eyes especially is very sensitive, so I have to be careful with the products I use. For anyone with issues like mine, I hope this review helps. Now, most people with these issues know that every dermatologist under the sun will warn you not to use skincare with fragrance, and this goes double for the skin on your face. One of the very first things I look at when determining whether I want to buy a skincare product is whether they have artificial fragrances added to it. Considering the trend of ‚Äúclean skincare,‚Äù and the reputation of this brand‚Äôs stuff being so high, I was very surprised (and a bit sad) to see they indeed have added fragrance. Still, considering I‚Äôd received this to review, I went ahead and gave it a try. To be honest, I did not use it long enough to see if it would cause my skin to have a reaction because the fragrance was too overpowering for me in general, especially since it was on my face, which told me I would eventually have a reaction if I kept using it. While some people may love the fragrance, for someone that rarely uses fragrance-added products, I definitely do not recommend this product. Both because the fragrance was too strong and because it is not recommended for people with my skin type. I was unable to use it for more than a few days because of that. I will say, however, that the quality of the product itself did seem to be very good and high-end. I just couldn‚Äôt get past the fragrance, and thus the threat to the integrity of my skin, to use it for longer than I had to.

reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm a longtime user of essences as part of my skincare routine. I was thrilled to get a sample of SK-II, which has long been touted as the holy grail of skincare.   After I wash my face and use my toner, I applied the Pitera essence as my third step since it‚Äôs so light and I didn‚Äôt want any other heavier product blocking its absorption. I just add a few drops to my palm and then press it into my skin to make sure it‚Äôs absorb. I do not recommend using a cotton pad and sweeping it across your face as that‚Äôs truly a waste of product as this product has a steep price tag plus I think tapping it onto your face helps your skin drink it all up.   There is a light fragrance but it‚Äôs a pleasant one, I can‚Äôt quite explain it but it‚Äôs a slight medicinal/plant-like scent that makes me think of luxe Korean/Japanese brands, not luxe western brands that are overwhelmingly intense with a more mature and powdery fragrance.   As for results, consistency is key. I do believe this essence kept my skin plump and brightens and revitalizes it. I can‚Äôt speak to the other claims of reducing dark spots or smoothing fine lines since I don‚Äôt currently deal with that.   The only reason I‚Äôm giving it 4-stars is because of its insanely steep price tag. But I get it, SK-II ferments a very specific strain of yeast and with that prime ingredient, it‚Äôs how you get that ‚Äúinstant‚Äù brightening/radiant glow on your skin.  All of this to say, would I purchase this on my own? Yes, with the caveat that it can‚Äôt be a regular recurring purchase because the price does pain me inside. I feel like I would relegate it to something super special save for an evening where I‚Äôm truly pampering myself unlike just using it daily, morning and night, as I have been with the sample. As someone who is a few years shy of 40, I know I will find this essential to keeping my skin hydrated and youthful.

reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm a skincare junkie. When I received this product to try from Influenster, I was so excited. SK-II has such a following, I was ready to see if it was worth the hype.  Honestly, it‚Äôs just ‚Äúokay.‚Äù I saw no significant difference in the look and feel of my skin which is very disappointing for a product at this price point.    Pros: - Nice fragrance to it that is not overpowering. - Product applies easily, is lightweight, and a little will go a long way. - Did not irritate my sensitive skin.  - Packaging is cute.  Cons: - Saw no significant difference in the look and feel of my skin when using this product. - Contains a lot of fermented ingredients which isn‚Äôt a deal breaker in itself. - Price point doesn‚Äôt really align for what the product is/does.   All in all, it isn‚Äôt a bad product. Just isn‚Äôt great.

reviews.review_title: Great for achieving healthy, glowy skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, acne prone skin and because of that, acne scars and larger pores around the nose area. I tried Pitera essence a long time ago and back then, did enjoy it, but not to the point that I‚Äôd repurchase it due to its price. Trying it this time around, I noticed a few things that I didn‚Äôt the first time. The scent can be extremely off-putting for many people, but that‚Äôs expected since it has fermented ingredients. I quickly got used to it. Once it‚Äôs on my face, I hardly noticed it. Also, since more products are layered after it, it doesn‚Äôt really bother me. The texture is just like water, not thicker like some essences can be. Despite that, it‚Äôs still easy to apply and absorbs quickly into the skin. It‚Äôs very soft and smooth, doesn‚Äôt irritate or sting the skin. I think it‚Äôs a great product to incorporate into my current routine for oily skin. I have noticed that my skin isn‚Äôt as oily as usual when I apply this, which is great. It doesn‚Äôt interfere with other products (moisturizer, sunscreen, makeup). I can apply everything else afterwards without a problem. I feel like it just increases the overall quality of my skin. It isn‚Äôt focused on one particular issue like acne or pores or dullness, but seems to elevate the skin, making it look healthier and glowing. It is definitely something that I will incorporate into my regular routine in the very near future- just need to finish some current products so I‚Äôm not applying 5000 things on my face everyday. The only downside is the price point, which is quite pricey. I would recommend trying out this product for at least one month and seeing if you like it first. A little goes a long way so even the complimentary small bottle I received from Influenster lasted quite a while (day and night application). Overall, if you can afford it, I would definitely give this a try and see if it works for you! **picture taken long before writing this review, my bottle is almost finished now**

Also in under a week my skin returned pretty much to normal. I have included a picture of how Bradley my face was burnt and a picture from a few days later and how improved it looked! I would highly recommend this product a little goes a long way and I feel it works as promised and is worth the cost!

reviews.review_text: No perfumes and very simple. Addresses any dryness of skin I have while evening out my skin tone and appearing to glow much more than it did before. I have dull and combo skin and its frustrating because some places are more dry than others and over moisturizing can cause my skin to break out while under moisturizing can wrinkle and dull/dry out my skin. This tended to balance it out and make my skin more versatile with makeup use. I was impressed and would def recommend. If you have already great skin then this won't do much for you, but for older people nearing their 40s this is a start. I also recommend getting reusable cloth pads to put on your skin so you don't waste product. Even my wrinkles lessened which I was a bit shocked about. Most products don't really work and seem to make my skin worse but this one definitely improved my skin. I actually can look at without cringing when without makeup which is a definite plus. My skin even feel more soft and supple which I didn't expect. Even pitera is the top ingredient on the list which makes me think Im paying for what Im getting not just a bunch of filler ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Pitera (a byproduct of yeast fermentation) essence is SK-II's signature product and comes with a hefty price tag, but is it worth it? Depends. I used it as part of a four product skin care routine (which started off with their Facial Treatment Cleanser, followed by their Clear Lotion Toner, then this Essence, and topped off with their Skinpower Airy Milky Lotion) and while my skin did look and feel nice, it wasn't significantly better than with the semi-comparable products I used prior.  If you wanted to get one product from SK-II to try, I would recommend this one as I do feel that the Essence does help improve the skin over time. The essence also has a bit of a yeasty scent which dissipates shortly after application (they suggest using a cotton pad, but I prefer applying with my hands as it feels less wasteful) and the essence absorbs into my skin pretty quickly. However, the reason why I give the product 3 stars is that while I do think it did help my skin, it wasn't significantly better than another essence (that is based on a rice ferment vs SK-II's yeast ferment) that I had bought because it costs less and was compared favorably to SK-II.  Overall, if you have the money and want to try this, I say give it a go.

Due to the price this is not something I will be adding to my regiment any time soon. It had a SLIGHT affect on my skin. However for how slight the difference it made and the price point of this item, I wouldn‚Äôt buy it myself when I have other products that have a better outcome at a lesser price.   **picture is from PRIOR to starting the regiment I just loved the packaging on this VoxBox everything was SO fancy and looked so pretty so 10/10 for packaging!**

At the time of using this regimen, I had a bad breakout happening on part of my chin/neck and it literally cleared up in 2 days!! My skin is clear and feels/looks incredible!! Not only do I highly recommend this whole regimen, but I myself will be buying more!! It is expensive but honesty if something works then it's worth every penny!

No new breakouts after the first week. Something I find shocking is that every year around this time, I get rashes on my cheeks and eyes because I live in Arizona - it's 120 degrees + sweat + dry heat that makes you feel like you're in an oven + now we wear masks. Well no rashes! No eczema break outs! Heck yeah, its a win for me. I used the Essence, Clear Lotion, Moisturizer & Cleanser together. I'd give it 5 stars if it wasn't so expensive.

I have tiny under the skin pimples on my forehead (which I never got even before accutane), chin, and jawline. It was so visible and made feel the discomfort I had when I was younger. Everyone is different and I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs a cult favorite but it didn‚Äôt work for me. I don‚Äôt recommend for people with prominent acne or a history of it.

My dry skin drank it up and I haven't been able to use long enough to say I see a difference. I had an exczema flare so I have had to stop for a while but plan to go back to using this. Essences tend to be potent so I feel it is worth the money to feed my skin even if I don't see a quick result. It can take a month for someone my age to see cellular turnover.

Even then, I felt like the essence absorbed so quickly into my hands and not my face so I felt like I was still missing out in this product. reviews.review_title: Amazing results & a little goes a long way!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had read all the rave reviews but honestly just didn‚Äôt think a skincare product could be worth the super high price tag! I was so excited to receive these products to review, but didn‚Äôt expect the results to justify the cost. I was wrong! My skin became noticeably softer and more radiant within a few uses of the SK-II line! My redness calmed down and my skin started glowing!! I genuinely cannot believe how well these products worked, and I plan to continue buying this Essence, which was my favorite of the 4 products I received to test! Unlike many other luxury skincare products with average ingredients lists, this product has SK-II‚Äôs Pitera as the top ingredient of the ingredients list!!   My tip is to follow their instructions by shaking the essence into your bare hands and then patting it into your face! At first I was disappointed by how small the Essence was, but I‚Äôve been using it twice a day for a month and still haven‚Äôt run out of the sample size!! Don‚Äôt waste it on a cotton pad! This really helps justify the cost for me because it‚Äôs going to last so long!

reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been using this essence for a while, way before I got this sample from Influenster. It has an odd smell, like a fermented liquid. Not too bothersome. It feels good on my skin, gets absorbed quickly. I think it makes my skin tone look more even. However, I also use retinol and face oil and it could be the combo. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! I‚Äôm in my late 30s and have battled cystic acne for well over 25 years now. The worst it‚Äôs been is recently, as I was postpartum with my second son. My entire jaw line and neck looked like I had a ‚Äúzit beard.‚Äù Constant break outs left discoloration as they healed, and new breakouts would crop up. Nothing I tried was working. Enter Pitera Essence. I don‚Äôt know what to describe it as, other than amazing! It‚Äôs lightweight, absorbs quickly, and is all around fantastic! Within just a few days my skin felt smoother, looked less dull, and the new breakouts had stopped. The old discoloration seems to be fading too. This stuff really is a miracle in a bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this entire regimen! I didn‚Äôt have the highest of expectations going in because my skin isn‚Äôt very problematic so I didn‚Äôt expect to see any noticeable differences, but I absolutely did! My skin feels so soft and clean when I use this regimen. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SK-II Facial Treatment Essence has a magical ingredient which is Pitera! This ingredient claims to have over 50 micro-nutrients such as vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and organic acids to condition skin's natural functions. Pitera can help intensify skin texture, boost brightness, firmness, reduce black spots, and diminish wrinkles Like all of my reviews I wanted to give this product a fair chance to prove itself.  I've used this product for about 3 weeks now and here are my thoughts... What I really liked about using SK-II Facial Treatment Essence is it really feels like your skin is getting hydration! When applying this 'magical water' it actually feels as it will be seeping literally into your skin!  Application: Cleanse your face with your your normal cleanser. This is good to use just to refresh your face or before putting on make up; 2 or 3 drops in your hands,  pat hands together twice then immediately pat it on your face and neck. You will feel the hydration! I also love using this product at night especially after a long and busy day because I feel like it's a nice and refreshing splash of additional hydration! *disclaimer* - it does come out fast when dispensing on either hands or cotton ball. I found this wasteful especially with the price point being so high for this product.  Skin types: All skin types. I personally have combination skin.  Texture: Lightweight like water Scent: PLEASE NOTE -  that it does have a unpleasant type of smell to it at first but it does dissipate after a few seconds. I was doing research why it smelled and it has to do with the smell of fermentation of Pitera. I actually like that they don't mask the smell with extra junk ingredients.  Price: It is definitely on the pricier side compared to other products I have  tested.  I can see why this is expensive: it does what it says it's going to do which is HYDRATE with the magical ingredient, PITERA!

reviews.review_text: I am really loving this product. Noticeable glow since I started using this pitera. I got this first as a sample from Influenster and have since purchased the largest size. It is expensive but will last a long time because you don‚Äôt need a ton. I still have some clogs and skin issues but believe this may be a compatible product for my sensitive clog prone skin. I don‚Äôt think it has any smell like others have commented on. The bigger size is in a nice glass bottle which I also appreciate. Try it and you maybe in trouble because you will get hooked.

reviews.review_title: After continuous use, I am impressed  w/ results
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this in exchange for an honest review.  At first, I was not super impressed with this product but now having used it most days for the last month I am seeing some significant results! After cleansing and toning my skin, I pour some in my hands and pat on my face before using serums and moisturizer. It is extremely gentle on my sensitive skin, no fragrance and does feel very hydrating. Also helps my serums spread and absorb into my skin better.    I didn‚Äôt notice any harm or bad reactions on my sensitive skin, and now looking at my skin today this essence has impressed me with the great results it has given me. It has helped shrink my pores, help settle redness and has brighten dark spots from acne scarring and sun damage without being or feeling harsh. I would absolutely continue using this product if it wasn‚Äôt so expensive. However, if when my sample runs out and I see my skin going back to being more dry, dull and uneven, I will invest in this brand and purchase this to incorporate into my morning/nightly skincare routine. Right now, I am very happy with how my skin is looking thanks to consistent and continuous use of this product.    I will update once I run out to see if I decide it was that beneficial enough to spend the hefty price tag to keep in my routine.

reviews.review_title: Pitera Essence - Holy Water for your face.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first impression when getting and opening the Essence Facial treatment is that it looked very modern and simplistic. I believe that packaging for facial products should be very minimalistic as well as when it comes to the ingredients. I like that the Pitera essence does not have a lot of ingredients in it. The smell is very aery and you‚Äôre not conscious that you have something on your face because it does not feel heavy. My skin felt revived after using it, especially living in Florida it helped keep my skin hydrated. I think this is because the consistency of the Essence is not heavy and it feels like holy water on your skin.  The only thing I did not agree with is that the bottle suggests you use a cotton pad to disperse product on your face. I think the cotton pad soaks up the product and in order to get the most out of it I just wash my hand thoroughly before applying the product. I would definitely recommend this to someone looking for a mist for their face.

reviews.review_title: Received for free but will purchase for myself now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster for free in exchange for an honest review. As an accidental skincare junkie (thanks to my very sensitive skin and teen acne that became adult acne) I have been wanting to try the SK-II Facial Treatment Essence with Pitera for a long time after reading so much press and so many glowing reviews on it. But it's not inexpensive and I have spent lots (and lots) of money on products that didn't work for me in the past, so I kept hesitating on buying a bottle. Getting selected for this campaign was super exciting.   That being said...THIS STUFF IS AMAZING. It makes my skin feel plump and hydrated. It's noticeably lightened some dark spots near my hairline that came from years of wearing a ponytail in the sun at youth sporting events and sweating off a lot of sunscreen. It has reduced the look and feel of scaring on my cheeks from years of cystic acne. I will absolutely be buying this stuff for myself from here on out.   A few pointers: it says you can apply with your palms or a cotton/fabric pad, but I definitely suggest palms. It doesn't feel like you're losing product to soaking into the fabric, and there's something meditative about pouring 3-4 splashes of this into your palms and patting them together before patting your face. As for the expense, I was pleasantly surprised that even after 3+ weeks of using it twice daily, I still have a little more than half the 1 oz bottle I received left. So it goes a long way, which doesn't make the regular size bottle feel like such a huge investment since it will probably last for months and months.

And my skin is so soft!

reviews.review_text: This review is for SK-II Facial Treatment Essence (Pitera Essence) which was tested as part of a regimen sent complimentary from Influenster and SK-II for testing purposes. It‚Äôs difficult to distinguish the effects of the individual products used as part of the regimen, I‚Äôve included an overall review for the regimen, and a review about specifics of the individual product in each product review on Influenster. I would do the same here, but for character limits. The regimen included: Facial Treatment Cleanser, Facial Treatment Clear Lotion Toner, Facial Treatment Essence (Pitera Essence), and SKINPOWER Cream, applied in that order.  Facial Treatment Essence (Pitera Essence): 5/5 My impression of the Facial Treatment Essence (Pitera Essence) is very positive. I will start by mentioning that it had quite a strong smell, reminiscent of Sake, but for some reason it doesn‚Äôt come off to me as something that would irritate people who are scent sensitive (for allergy purposes. If you‚Äôre scent sensitive for purposes such as migraine triggers, it‚Äôs still a no, but I get migraines and it didn‚Äôt happen to trigger me, for whatever that‚Äôs worth to you). This product is definitely moisturizing and softening, but I‚Äôm also quite certain that this is responsible for much of the dewiness and brightening I get from this regimen. I do not have the problem with this product bottle that I have with the Facial Treatment Clear Lotion Toner, as even though I still apply with my hands, I only get about a drop out at a time when I invert the bottle, which is what I want to prevent waste. If I had to order all the products in this regimen from most to least favourite, this would be at the top. It‚Äôs clearly the secret sauce of this regimen and makes the biggest difference. If you‚Äôre only looking to try out one product of this softening, brightening, moisturizing regimen, I would start here.

reviews.review_title: From crusty to glowing in five minutes flat!

reviews.review_text: Okay, I'm a little shook! I have to be honest and admit that during this lockdown time, I have not always stuck to my facial care routine. This essence is extremely mild and nourishing, and after pressing in a few drops as per the directions, my face (and hands!) instantly felt better. Even after burning the midnight oil, power-wearing about six layers of foundation, some light epilation, and (somewhat lazily) triple-cleansing with jojoba/witch hazel, a makeup remover wipe, and a glycolic wipe, I actually feel like my skin is clean and happy. I wanted to try a few different essences for a while now, and this one boasts that it is 90% Pitera, which is a derivative of the sake fermentation process. I'm a big fan of probiotics, both externally and internally, and this one is a win!

When I woke up the next morning, it was clear which side I had used the product on. The side I used the essence on just felt smoother, more moisturized, and softer to the touch. I love this product and it will now be a staple in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_text: I tried this SK-II facial treatment essence Pitera recently and this is my review for the product. This facial treatment essence is liquid like a toner. It is a clear liquid that you apply with a cotton ball or your hands. I know this is a staple and must have product for so many ladies and I wanted to like it but I felt like it didn't do much for me and also felt like it dried my skin out a bit. I didn't have a large enough quantity to see if there was any long term effects in how my skin reacted to if and whether it's anti-aging claims were effective, but my skin did feel soft and smooth while using this product and it glowed nicely. Overall, I think this was a decent product and had no real problems with it, but due to the ingredients and quality I probably won't be using this again.

I have acne scars that manifest in the form of dark spots and this SK-II regime has nearly erased them all. I now see that the hype is all about. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This essence is a gold standard to beauty industry. It looks like water ‚Äî just like the rest ‚Äî but this formula is packed with the proprietary Pitera complex. Pitera was discovered when scientists realized that Japanese sake makers had ageless hands. Now, a similar yeast and fermentation process is used to create the vitamin and mineral-rich ingredient that stars in many SK-II products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product.  Very lightweight and easy to layer into any skincare routine.  Basically no scent, and absorbs immediately.  No piling underneath makeup.  For the uninitiated- pitera is a galactomyces ferment, which had been shown to reduce signs of aging.  Just know that this is a preventative product, and will not REVERSE the aging you already have.  So start early folks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products for free from Influenster and SK II in exchange for my honest review. This essence is just ok. I used the SK II lotion (toner) in combination with this and I am a bit confused about using the toner then the essence as they are both a water like product. This essence felt a bit sticky and took longer to dry than the toner. The directions say to pat on face which I found kinda hard to do since it‚Äôs water so I put it on a cotton pad and dabbed/swiped it on. It smells nice (with a strong scent), and it didn‚Äôt make me breakout or irritate my skin. I got a travel/sample size SK II product that lasted me about a week with both AM and PM use. In my opinion it takes longer than a week to see real results from using new skin care so I can‚Äôt speak to long term results. I also wish this essence and the SK II products didn‚Äôt contain so many chemicals and had more natural ingredients. And also the packaging is plastic (very simple packaging for the price) which I like less. So I didn‚Äôt see a difference in my skin and for the high price of these products and this essence I don‚Äôt think I will be purchasing this essence. There are better options with better prices out there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For quite some time I have wanted to try out SK-II skincare products because of the popularity they have received over the years. The quality of the ingredients claim to hydrate, plump and even out texture of your skin.   I am 35 years old, typically with very dry sensitive skin.   I really wanted to like these products, however, after 30 days I really haven‚Äôt noticed a dramatic difference to warrant the price point.   Their essence, the most renowned product in their line, was lightweight and hydrating, with a subtle hint of a skincare fragrance. It was my favorite of all the products received as it has I felt it provided my skin with the most hydrating benefits with the least fragrance. I didn‚Äôt find it revolutionary or anything, just more of your everyday toner of sorts.   Now ultimately it boils down to is it worth the price point? For me, not so much, but if you are a die hard fanatic or with a disposable income which these products work wonders for you, then yes. Otherwise I would recommend other great quality brands on the market.

reviews.review_text: The SKII Essence has had such a positive effect on my skin. Ever since I incorporated this product into my skincare routine, I have noticed my skin having an overall healthier appearance. This essence is extremely moisturizing, while being extremely lightweight. I have also noticed  my pores appear smaller. I have used this product on no makeup days, as well as, Under makeup, and it works very well under makeup giving my skin an ethereal glow. The only con, would be the price (although there‚Äôs no amount I wouldn‚Äôt pay for great quality and undeniable results). Due to the luxury cost of this product, it is inaccessible to a great deal of the population. I thoroughly enjoyed this product and I 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The SK-II Pitera Essence is amazing. When I first used the Pitera Essence on my facial it felt sticky and tacky. I applied three drops onto my clean hands as instructed. I‚Äôm not sure what causes the stickiness but it resolved after several days. I would apply my serums after using the Pitera Essence. My serums absorbed well into my skin, just as they would with my usual skin care products. My skin tolerated the Essence well. I had a few pimples appear the first few days but my skin was relatively clear after a week. The Pitera Essence did not have a strong fragrance and it did not leave any residue on my skin once it absorbed. I currently use an essence with my skin care regimen and my skin is clear. I have an occasional pimple with the SK-II regimen as I do with current regimen. The SK-II products are very nice but they are also pricey. If you can afford to purchase them then I would highly recommend them. It was a pleasure to use the SK-II products courtesy of SK-II and Influenster. I probably would not have been able to afford them on my own unless I was given a sample. It was definitely a special treat for my skin.

I was shocked when I found out I was chosen to be sent SK-II‚Äôs Facial Treatment Essence complimentary for testing purposes courtesy of SK-II and Influenster. After using cleanser and toner, I used the Facial Treatment Essence by putting a few drops in my hand and then patting it all over my face. The essence smells clean with no noticeable added fragrance, absorbs quickly, and doesn‚Äôt leave the skin feeling sticky after application. After a week or so of using this product, I noticed that my skin looked smoother. I have noticeable pores and the beginnings of fine lines, but this seemed to help minimize the size of my pores and smooth out my fine lines. I was surprised by how quickly I noticed a change in the texture of my skin. I was also pleased that I saw such great results and only had to use a small amount of essence each day. A little definitely goes a long way, so I think this product will last a long time before needing to buy a replacement. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a product that helps achieve smaller pores and smoother skin.

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in return for my honest review. The cleanser has a very subtle and light smell to it. It reminded me of  Witch Hazel. I used  about 3 drops of this cleanser and it has lasted me more than 3 weeks.  A little does go a long way.  I applied it with a facial cleansing pad.  When I 1st started using this I did notice that my face did break out and after a week I started using my pimple treatment cream. I figured it was probably the cleanser pulling out impurities in my skin.  Eventually with the use of my pimple treatment cream my face did start to clear up. This cleaner does remove excess dirt and make up and does not leave your face feeling sticky.  This is a pretty expensive product and for the price I didn't notice a substantial difference in my skin. I feel you could have received the same results with a more budget friendly priced cleanser.  Had there been remarkable results then it would have been worth the price that this product costs but I did not notice any Major changes in my skin that I had not noticed with lower cost products of the same nature. I would not purchase this product due to the price factor and the minimal results that I noticed. If this product was more reasonably priced for the results that I saw with my skin then I would probably purchase this product.

It leaves a tacky dewy finish which is a perfect prep for my moisturizer to grip well and penetrate my skin deeply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've only been using this for about a week now but my face is loving it. For reference I have combo-oily skin that is seriously oily in the t-zone and the u-zone is normal, not dry. I apply this after cleansing with whichever cleanser floats my boat at the moment. I pour a very very small amount into my palm, dip two fingers of my other hand into the essence and smooth over my face. Then I rub my palms together and press the essence into my face. My skin never feels sticky from the essence which is amazing since every other product of this type always feel sticky. After it dries, which is very quickly, I then proceed with the rest of my skincare... serum, moisturizer, sunscreen, etc. My face feels extremely balanced - t-zone less oily for sure - never dry - never tight - no breakouts - just very happy.

reviews.review_title: Refreshing essence but made little difference.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complementary sample of this SK-11 product from Influenster along with a few others from the line and tested them for 2 weeks. The essence absorbed easily, did not leave a sticky residue, and had a light fragrance which was refreshing. However, for its high price point, I found that it did not give as dramatic moisturizing and brightening results as I expected it would. I have combination skin and issues with acne and first I noticed it was soothing the redness with a bit of a brightening effect, but towards the end of my test period with the product I found that my skin was still dry in some areas and it did not do much to improve my acne. As for the packaging, it could use improvement as it was difficult to control how much essence was coming out.   Overall, I personally would not be incorporating this into my routine after I finish the sample due to the high price point. For anyone who can afford it though, I would recommend trying it out as the product leaves you feeling very natural and clean without any chemical feel to it.

reviews.review_text: This essence is surprisingly long-lasting. A small amount of this gets the job done. The smell is faint it does have a slight scent of sake. It splashes on gently, feels very refreshing on my skin. My skin is redness-prone and I immediately noticed a wonderful balancing effect.  This essence didn't cause any irritation or redness. In fact, I it reduced my redness. I found my serums to abosorb much better after applying this essence. I have also noticed a difference in the appearance of my pores. Making my pores smaller. I got this product in a voxbox and I'm so happy I did. I will be buying it for sure.

reviews.review_title: Cheap product disguised as high end
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On a whole, this product line was nothing impressive. Each item on it's own lacked anything that I would call a skin improvement. And used together, I felt little benefits. It's truly hard to rate each individual item, which is why I have grouped them all under one review.  The Cleanser: the cleanser was soft and gentle, and had a nice foam to it. It strongly reminded me of the drug store cleansers I used as a teenager (Clearasil). Unfortunately, it does not do a good job cleansing. With makeup, I had to do several washes and still couldn't remove all makeup. Without makeup, there was still a lot of dirt on the cotton pad used after toner.   Clear Lotion: this is just their fancy way of saying toner. Again, nothing impressive about this toner. It did it's basic function without leaving my face dry or sticky.   Pitera Essence: this is their signature product line ingredient. The Pitera essence is meant to be patted onto your cleansed and toned skin. Not entirely sure I'm seeing the results they claim. I felt they placed a lot of emphasis on how amazing Pitera is, almost like an infomercial.   Airy Milk Lotion: nothing airy or milk like about this moisturizer. It is on the thicker side, with an extremely high fragrance. Any slight cuts or open acne will burn upon application. My face was left feeling slightly sticky. Even with primer, makeup application looked streaky at best. The moisturizer truly felt like a cheap product.    Overall, the product line is cheap feeling and offered very little, if any overall benefits. This Proctor and Gamble skin line is a cheap product disguised as a high end product line. Don't be fooled. The product strongly reminds me of Proactiv, though I'd recommend the Proactiv line far over this line. The SK-II line is worth no more than $25 for the whole set, and I wouldn't even purchase it at that price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really intrigued by this, as I have never used anything with Pitera Essence before! Before use, I thoroughly cleansed my face as instructed. The instructions say to shake the bottle 2-3 times into your hand, and press the liquid into your face. 2-3 shakes was all I needed. My first impression was that it felt refreshing! It also has a pleasant scent and dries quickly. I have used the product 3-4 times so far, not truly enough to see a difference in my skin yet. I will keep using the product and see how it goes!

reviews.review_title: I think Essence is a hit!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and SK-II in exchange for my honest review.  I‚Äôve been using SK-II PITERA Essence twice a day for about a month. I wash my face with a gentle drug store cleanser and toner and then apply two-three drops of Essence to my face. My face always felt very soft after application.   I was unsure if there was differences in my skin, but my mom commented, without knowing I was using new products, that my skin looked smoother, softer, more even, and had fewer dark spots.   I would recommend this product based on my experience. The packaging is good. I, personally, did not notice Essence having a strong scent (I‚Äôm typically sensitive to scent too). The consistency of the product is much like water. It glides on nicely and soaks into the skin.
